{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Digital Media Receiver |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Amazon_Fire_TV_(CL1130) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Amazon |model = Fire TV |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (CL1130) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media streamer,media receiver |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = S59-4891,PPD-QCA6234 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;APQ8064T; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7 |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBM5G6A2JBAIR; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K3PE0E00QM-CGC2; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8152-B; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 6.25 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI out, TOSLINK audio out |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U73X003 |manuf_rev = .00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/11/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 99.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00CX5P8FC |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |multirev = Yes |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Qualcomm Atheros QCA6234 |rad1modif = SIP (on-board) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR6004; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR3002; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This is [[Roku]]-esque media streaming device / general purpose TV computer (gaming console functionality, w/ tailored game controllers). It's pretty beefy. <small>The bar is obviously being raised for [[Roku]] + competitors..</small>
This device was filed under a grantee code of a random LLC (''Ailen LLC''), which ''Amazon'' has been doing for a while..
==Links of Interest== *[https://developer.amazon.com/public/solutions/devices/fire-tv/docs/device-and-platform-specifications ''Device and Platform Specifications'' on Amazon]
===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Amazon Fire TV}} ===Teardowns=== *[http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Amazon+Fire+TV+Teardown/23856 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] (and their general [http://www.ifixit.com/Device/Amazon_Fire_TV '''Fire TV''' portal] page) :Specifications used in this entry are per '''iFixit''''s teardown.. :("PCB: 30-000772 REV 05" and "PCBA: 31-000797 REV") and :("U73X003T00", "REV.2 GP", "000506") is silkscreened on the board shown. :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] APQ8064 ([https://www.qualcomm.com/products/snapdragon/processors/s4-s1 Snapdragon]) quad-core @1.7GHz :*Flash: [[Toshiba]] THGBM5G6A2JBAIR 8GB eMMC NAND :*RAM: [[Samsung]] K3PE0E00QM-CGC2 2GB LPDDR2 @533MHz :*GPU: [[Qualcomm]] Adreno 320 dedicated GPU :*PMU: [[Qualcomm]] PMM8920 Power Management IC :*Eth: [[Atheros]] AR8152-B PCIe Fast Ethernet Controller :*Clock: ''Pericom'' PI6C557-03ALE PCIe Clock :*Audio: [[Texas Instruments]] DIT4192 Digital Audio Transmitter :*WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6234XH ([[Qualcomm Atheros QCA6234]]) ::integrated dual-band 2x2 802.11n + Bluetooth 4.0 chip ::the same seen on the [[Amazon Kindle Fire HDX, 2013, 7" w/ Wi-Fi (C9R6QM)|Amazon Kindle Fire 7" HDX]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
